resources.string: Unable to load data from server.

TapeRay was developed as a community for art-enthusiasts using vinyl foil as their expression media. This type of art is also widely known as WALL DECAL. This application is able to map all TapeRay artworks into a live video image, recorded by the camera of your mobile phone. You can resize the artworks with finger gestures and move them around to get a feeling of how they might look like on the place where you want them. Check out our website for more information: http://taperay.com
